data.title: Jamal Niaz on LinkedIn: It was brilliant to interview Hollywood stars such as Jessie T. Usher‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: It was brilliant to interview Hollywood stars such as Jessie T. Usher, Gustaf Skarsgard, Pollyana McIntosh, Mike Starr, Jake Busey & more at Comic Con‚Ä¶
data.text:
Brilliant few days covering the pressers for Anthony Joshua vs Daniel Dubois, KSI vs Slim & Anthony Taylor and Jack Catterall vs Regis Prograis, with my interviews from these events reaching over 200K views across socials üé§ Undoubtedly my favourite interview of the week was with one of the greatest boxers of all time, Prince Naseem Hamed - a true icon of the sport and a pleasure to speak to üëä JNMEDIA is proudly sponsored by Morson Group: Morson Talent is part of the diverse Morson Group who has an outstanding reputation for delivering consultancy, design, technology, training, screening and people solutions around the world. At Morson you will join a family that will care for your mind, body and soul. Take a look at our careers site to find the latest opportunities at Morson: https://www.morson.com/

Incredible first weekend working as Bellator's backstage interviewer in Dublin and brilliant to get Conor McGregor's reaction to the card! We discussed how he's inspired young Nate 'The Great' Kelly to pursue his dreams, his thoughts on his close friend, Sinead Kavanagh's fight, his future and more! Watch the full interview with Conor, as well as my interviews with new Bellator Welterweight Champion, Ramazan Kuramagomedov, Paul Hughes, Nathan Kelly, Nate Kelly & Darragh Kelly on Bellator's YouTube channel in the link below: https://lnkd.in/ehCDfrn6 I already can‚Äôt wait for the next one! #Interviewer #ConorMcGregor #MMA #Fightfans #CombatSports #BellatorMMA

Awesome first fight night working with PFL Europe as their official backstage interviewer! üé§ Savannah Marshall‚Äôs PFL debut was one of the wildest one round fights I‚Äôve ever seen! What a moment for her and all signs now point to a monster rematch with Claressa Shields in the SmartCage ü§Ø Watch all my post fight interviews on PFL Europe‚Äôs YouTube channels and look out for clips on PFL and DAZN MMA‚Äôs socials üì∫ Full interviews: https://lnkd.in/eynpBtiA A pleasure to join the team, I can‚Äôt wait for what‚Äôs ahead‚ÄºÔ∏è #PFLEurope #SavannahMarshall #ClarissaShields #MMA #MMAfans #PFLNewcastle #Interviewer #Reporter

Over 400K views on my Fury vs Usyk fight week interviews and content on JNMEDIA‚Äôs socials‚ÄºÔ∏èüëä Keep up to date with the biggest interviews in Sport and Cinema across the JNMEDIA socials below by subscribing and following üëá YouTube: https://lnkd.in/dTKqspxr Instagram: https://lnkd.in/eWsuzGkQ Tik Tok: https://lnkd.in/ddwf6695 Website: https://www.jnmedia.uk I‚Äôm proud to have JNMEDIA sponsored by Morson Group #Reporter #Presenter #SportReporter #FilmReporter #Journalist #Cinema #Boxing #MMA

Incredible chat with the legendary, Andy Serkis for Monopoly Events at Comic Con Liverpool‚ÄºÔ∏è He spoke to me about reuniting with his fellow Lord of The Rings cast members in Liverpool, how he compares the experiences of seeing his performances of Gollum, Caesar & King Kong on the big screen for the first time & more! üçø Watch the full interview on Monopoly Events‚Äô YouTube channel now! üëá https://lnkd.in/g_KAW-au #TheLordofTheRings #AndySerkis #Reporter #Journalist #FilmReporter #Movies #Cinema

One of my career highlights interviewing a true icon of cinema, Andy Serkis at Comic Con Liverpool for Monopoly Events about his incredible career starring as Gollum in Lord of The Rings, Caesar in the Planet of The Apes trilogy, King Kong, Alfred in The Batman & more‚ÄºÔ∏è Look out for the full interview coming to Monopoly Events‚Äô YouTube channel this week üé§üì∫ Andy couldn‚Äôt have been a nicer person to chat to, I can‚Äôt wait to see his next work üî• #Movies #AndySerkis #filmfans #TheLordofTheRings #StarWars #TheBatman #Reporter #FilmReporter #Interviewer

Brilliant to see over 300K accounts reached on Instagram alone in the past month, with over 500K across socials! Over 400K views across socials in the first week of JNMEDIA‚Äôs partnership with Morson Group, with interviews with Tyson Fury, Tommy Fury, Eddie Hearn, UFC Interim Heavyweight Champion, Tom Aspinall, renowned reporter, Kate Abdo and pound for pound boxing great, Artur Beterbiev being the stand-outs‚ÄºÔ∏è Great to see articles of my Tommy Fury exclusive on TalkSport, Sport Bible, DAZN and The Mirror too ü§ù Subscribe to the JNMEDIAUK YouTube channel here: https://lnkd.in/eyFCwSY5 Follow on Instagram: https://lnkd.in/eWsuzGkQ Follow on Tik Tok: https://lnkd.in/exSCNuBj #mma #boxing #tysonfury #tomaspinall #eddiehearn #frankwarren #reporter #sportsreporter #interviewer

Tyson Fury gave me his thoughts on if there could possibly be step-aside money for Usyk should Fury beat him, to allow the much anticipated fight between himself and Anthony Joshua to take place rather than the rematch clause between Fury and Usyk‚ÄºÔ∏è We also discussed his thoughts on how calm Usyk has remained in the build-up and if there would be bad blood with Joshua in the build-up to their fight when it happens! üé§ Watch the full interview on the JNMEDIAUK YouTube channel üì∫ https://lnkd.in/e8vqSUmQ Shorts clip: https://lnkd.in/ekbEzbH8 JNMEDIA is proudly sponsored by Morson Group https://www.morson.com #Boxing #TysonFury #Boxingfans #Interviewer #Reporter #SportsReporter #ConorMcGregor #MikeTyson #AnthonyJoshua #Usyk #EddieHearn #FrankWarren
